creditline: Lent by Raymond and Virginia Atchley
description: wood pipe case with maple leaf design holding a thin metal pipe attached by a silk cord to lidded wood container decorated with ants
dimension: pipe: H.6 in.; pipe case: H.8 x W.7/8 x D.1/2 in.; container: H.2 x W.2-1/2 x D.1-3/4 in.
title: Pipe Case with Tonkotsu
